text: A hobby or an interest that I am so passionate about is football. It could be watching football or even the fantasy games that are created from the Premier League or something called FPL. it keeps me occupied and the rank I get from it makes me a little happier. I just think that strategical moves, the game is based on luck mostly because we can never guess what happens in an actual football match. But it is good to have strategized moves such that it aligns with how you are as a player.

traits.details: The text reveals a moderate level of imagination, as the speaker engages in fantasy football games and thinks strategically about their moves, indicating a capacity for creative thinking and problem-solving within a specific context, but does not exhibit a preference for imaginative scenarios over practical or factual ones.
